props.lead_gen_heading: Let us know enough to get in touch if you win.
props.description: Gamifying the World Health Organization's guidelines on #safehands with a Spatial Interactive Learning Experience. Keep yourself and your family safe, play this now at g3d.in/safehands  Top the leader-board, get rewarded. Powered by GMetri.
props.project_start_description:
#safehands
An interactive game to learn WHO's Hand-Wash guidelines.
